Plot: As he plans his next job, a longtime thief tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to one of his earlier heists, as well as the FBI agent looking to bring him and his crew down.
Title: The Town
Writer: Peter Craig (screenplay), Ben Affleck (screenplay), Aaron Stockard (screenplay), Chuck Hogan (novel)
Actors: Ben Affleck, Rebecca Hall, Jon Hamm, Jeremy Renner
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 44 nominations.
